metadata.title: CVE-2023-31047 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In Django 3.2 before 3.2.19, 4.x before 4.1.9, and 4.2 before 4.2.1, it waspossible to bypass validation when using one form field to upload multiplefiles. This multiple upload has never been supported by forms.FileField orforms.ImageField (only the last uploaded file was validated). However,Django's "Uploading multiple files" documentation suggested otherwise.

criterions.comment: python-django: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
